mapper.sql: fileBsn.id, fileBsn.file_id, fileBsn.bsn_id, fileBsn.bsn_type, fileBsn.upload_user_id, fileBsn.upload_user_name, fileBsn.upload_date, fileBsn.delete_mark
mapper.select: select t1.seq_index+1 from (select tt.seq_index,tt.bsn_id from base_file_bsn tt where tt.bsn_id=#{bsnId} and tt.display_name=#{displayName} union select -1,#{bsnId}) t1 where not exists (select t2.seq_index from (select tt.seq_index from base_file_bsn tt where tt.bsn_id=#{bsnId} and tt.display_name=#{displayName} union select -1) t2 where t2.seq_index=t1.seq_index+1) and bsn_id=#{bsnId} order by t1.seq_index limit 1
